title: Help me with my assignment by filling this form up... Please
selftext:
Please fill this form to help in my research "Hindi OTT Content and the LGBT Community: A Study on the Audience Effect

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd7EFhWV5ce6jtQwfJMBv5txptf7YmKlo8XjH9h8sXzCSxTeQ/viewform?usp=sf_link

I'd be great if I could get about 50 responses by tonight
comments:
chat.openai.com
If you are afraid that ai text checker will get you caught ask the ai to write in a way that chat gpt text detector couldn't detect your text
Thank you for this advice. This is gonna help me a lot

No problem 
Just upvote my comment :)
Im trying to collect karma points
